frontmatter.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Made Simple
frontmatter.description: There’s a smarter, easier way to get lasting relief from anger, panic, stress, and other mood-related conditions. Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Made Simple delivers a streamlined approach to the most essential aspects of CBT and shows you how to apply these powerful, fundamental principles to your daily life. Progress at your own pace toward healing with this simplified approach to cognitive behavior therapy.
